fields.headline: Homes: Beyond the pale
fields.bodyText: Shelf life Pale Peony matt emulsion £23/2.5 litres, by Laura Ashley (lauraashley.com). Le Klint 172 light £248, by Geoffrey Harris (geoffreyharris.co.uk). Lack shelf £17.99, from Ikea (ikea.com). Plus Minus Zero wall clock £122, from TwentyTwentyOne (twentytwentyone.com). Alvar Aalto duo coloured dish £139, from Skandium (skandium.com). Large American milk glass cake stand £54, from Re (re-foundobjects.com). Pink "a" £2.50, from Paperchase (paperchase.co.uk). Green toothbrush £6, by Paul Smith (paulsmith.co.uk). White milk glass goblet £3, from Kempton Antiques Market (kemptonantiques.com). Bottle £140, from Sophie Cook (sophiecook.com). Elephant bank £95, by Jonathan Adler, from Heal's (heals.co.uk). Pink paper and yellow Post-it arrow from a selection at Paperchase, as before. Up, up and away Sky wallpaper £32.77 a roll, by Anna French, from wallpaperdirect.co.uk. Neat Pink matt emulsion (left and below) £10.98, from B&Q (diy.com). Radiator £461.77, from Bisque (bisque.co.uk). Chairs £69 each, from Aria (ariashop.co.uk). Cake stand £25, from etsy.com. Macaroons £12 for a box of eight, from Ladurée (laduree.fr). Tumbler £6 for four, from Habitat (habitat.co.uk). Bird £11.75 for 12, from DZD (dzd.co.uk). Birdland Grecian Spa 3 mtt emulsion £19.99/ 2.5 litres, from Dulux (dulux.co.uk). Flamingo £56.40, by DZD, as before. Phone £39, from Design Museum (design museumshop.com). Chaise longue £859.99, from Go Modern (gomodern.co.uk). Towel £6.99, by Ikea, as before. Ball, stylist's own.
